name: Timeless Tom
description:
In this game you play as Tom, our hero who can Rewind Time of nearby objects. Climb through falling platforms, repair covers and shoot robots in this Action filled Game.

This is our first game for a GameJam

Theres a bug with the pause menu. to avoid it, choose dificulty in options menu, sorry for the inconvenience.

Credits :

CAPUTO, Federico.  KANESHIRO, Matias.   LOPEZ F. , Santiago

Saludos de Argentina
